channel.title: Sratools on Not A Rocket Scientist
channel.description: Recent content in Sratools on Not A Rocket Scientist

item.title: Getting Index Reads From SRA
item.description: A few month ago, I ranted about the FastQ files submission for data produced by complex genomic protocols. The main reason of the rant is that we tried to get some single cell data from SRA, and we really needed the cell barcodes for the data preprocessing and analysis. However, the cell barcodes are stored in the indexing reads where it seems impossible to get from the .sra file. Recently, I finally found a way of getting those information … well … at least for some studies. Here, I’m just documenting what happened.
